title: Notorious
description: When the town's most notorious heartbreaker...Dangerously seductive and sinfully beautiful, Susanna Burney is society's most sought after matchbreaker Paid by wealthy parents to part unsuitable couples, she's never yet failed to accomplish her mission of diverting a groom-to-be. Until her final assignment brings her face-to-face with the man who'd once taught her an intimate lesson in heartache...Meets London's most disreputable rake...James Devlin has everything he's always a title, a rich fianc√©e and a place in society. But the woman who's just met his eyes across a crowded ballroom threatens it all. Not because she'd once claimed his heart, or that every sinuous swirl of her ball gown takes his breath away. But because the secrets she carries could cost him everything.To put the past to rest once and for all, Dev just might have to play Susanna at her own wicked game...Let the seduction begin!
author: Nicola Cornick
